potion.name: Healing Potion
potion.onUse: const healAmount = Math.floor(player.maxHealth * 0.33); player.health = Math.min(player.health + healAmount, player.maxHealth); log(`You used a ${this.name} and recovered ${healAmount} HP!`);

whetstone.name: Whetstone
whetstone.onUse: player.attack += 3; log(`You used the whetstone and gained 3 attack!`);

shredOfWisdom.name: Shred of Wisdom
shredOfWisdom.onUse: if (player.hasToK) {player.experienceMultiplier += 0.05; log(`The shred of wisdom pops into your subconscious. You feel a little wiser to the world. +5% xp gain.`);} else {player.experienceMultiplier += 0.03; log(`The shred of wisdom pops into your subconscious. You feel a bit wiser to the world. +3% xp gain.`)}

tankBrew.name: Tank's Brew
tankBrew.onUse: player.maxHealth += 10; player.health += 10; player.defense += 1; log(`You drank the Tank's Brew... it tastes like alcohol. +10hp & +1def`);
